statements: SELECT * FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_result = TRUE;
SELECT compliance_date, compliance_type FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_result = FALSE;
SELECT employee_id, compliance_type, compliance_result FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_notes LIKE '%safety%';
SELECT employee_id, compliance_date, compliance_notes FROM safety_compliance_data ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_result = TRUE;
SELECT compliance_type, compliance_date FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_result = FALSE ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_type LIKE '%fire%' AND compliance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_date ASC;
SELECT compliance_notes FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_type = 'Equipment Inspection' AND compliance_result = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, compliance_date, compliance_type FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_result = TRUE LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance_data;
SELECT id, employee_name FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM safety_compliance_data ORDER BY department;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_description FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = false;
SELECT id, employee_name, department FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE department = 'IT' AND compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_name, compliance_date, violation_description FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_type = 'Safety Inspection';
SELECT * FROM safety_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name FROM safety_compliance_data JOIN safety_incidents ON safety_compliance_data.id = safety_incidents.employee_id;

SELECT employee_name, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM safety_compliance_data JOIN safety_incidents ON safety_compliance_data.id = safety_incidents.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance_data ORDER BY compliance_date ASC, compliance_type DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_name, violation_description FROM safety_compliance_data WHERE compliance_type = 'Safety Audit'
SELECT * FROM safety_training WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY training_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM safety_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT training_type, MIN(training_duration) AS min_duration FROM safety_training GROUP BY training_type ORDER BY min_duration ASC
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance;
SELECT employee_name, compliance_status FROM safety_compliance ORDER BY last_compliance_date DESC;
SELECT training_title, trainer_name FROM safety_trainings WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM safety_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT reporter_name, report_text FROM safety_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM safety_compliance ORDER BY last_compliance_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, employee_name, compliance_status FROM safety_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM safety_trainings WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01' AND training_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT reporter_name, report_text FROM safety_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM safety_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%fire%' ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Safety_Team;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM Safety_Team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, employee_department FROM Employee WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE 'ISO%';
SELECT checklist_name FROM Safety_Checklist WHERE checklist_items @> '{"item": "Fire Extinguisher"}';
SELECT * FROM Safety_Team;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM Safety_Team ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_role, r.regulation_name FROM Employee e INNER JOIN Compliance_Regulations r ON e.employee_department = r.regulation_name;

SELECT cr.regulation_name, cr.regulation_description, COUNT(ir.report_id) AS num_reports FROM Compliance_Regulations cr LEFT JOIN Incident_Reports ir ON cr.regulation_id = ir.report_id GROUP BY cr.regulation_name;
SELECT sc.checklist_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(sc.checklist_items) AS item FROM Safety_Checklist sc WHERE checklist_name LIKE 'Fire Safety Checklist%';
